description: Rigs of Rods is a vehicle simulator that implements soft-body physics to simulate vehicle motion and collisions. You can create custom vehicles with Rigs of Rods, then save them as TRUCK files. After saving a TRUCK file, you can share it with other Rigs of Rods users, who can then import the vehicle into their simulator installations.
